Articles.Content:
G'day everyone.

I'm noticing weird Aerodynamic fx in the latest version of KSP. Fresh install of stock KSP. Why is the plane transparent?

https://imgur.com/a/AAb580K

Album a/AAb580K will appear when post is submitted

 

Edited June 21, 2018 by brumby
imgur links

It is not just you.  The re-entry effects look like that for everyone.  (But I don't know why, so can't answer your literal question.)

I have read here that the craft were always transparent to these effects, but only the recent (in KSP version 1.4.x) changes to the look of these effects let us notice that the craft was transparent.

The change-log to the today's new version 1.4.4 seems to say that this bug was fixed 

* Fix reentry VFX showing from hidden side of vessel (ie. showing through the vessel).
